articles.title: Netflix's One Piece: Is Hollywood finally doing anime right? - BBC
articles.description: The live action adaptation of a cult manga classic has received positive reviews from critics.
articles.content:
Netflix's live-action adaptation of the Japanese anime series One Piece has been described as a surprise hit, receiving mostly praise from critics.
